name: Colin McRae: Dirt 2 - Trust Fund Pack
summary: Grab all-star access with the DiRT2 Trust Fund Pack. Download now and instantly unlock 25 best-in-class World Tour vehicles. Plus 10 exhilarating ‘Easter egg’ secret vehicles, 93 liveries and every available upgrade at pro and all star level then take on the World Tour in style. NOTE: All content made available via the purchase of this DLC can be unlocked through normal gameplay. (DiRT2 game disc required) There are no refunds for this item
